data.title: Famous People From Torrance, California & Celebs Born In Torrance
data.meta_description: Torrance has produced a number of famous personalities, including basketball players, actors, models etc.
data.text:
1

Rami Malek

(Famous For His Portrayal of 'Freddie Mercury' in the Biopic 'Bohemian Rhapsody')

172

70

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: May 12, 1981

Sun Sign: Taurus

Rami Malek became the first actor of Egyptian origin to receive the prestigious Oscar for Best Actor, which he earned for playing British singer, Freddie Mercury, in the movie Bohemian Rhapsody. In 2019, he was named in Time magazine's list of 100 most influential people in the world. He also has a philanthropic side and supports various charities..

Jeremy Lin

(Professional Basketball Player and First Asian American to Win an NBA Championship)

120

43

Listed In: Sportspersons

Birthdate: August 23, 1988

Sun Sign: Virgo

Taiwanese-American professional basketball player Jeremy Lin is famous for being the first Asian American to win an NBA championship. He has played for numerous teams in his career, the Beijing Ducks of the Chinese Basketball Association (CBA) being the latest. He loves music and has collaborated with the rapper MC Jin on the single "The First Opponent."

AJ Michalka

(Actress and Singer Best Known as One Half of the Musical Group '78violet')

23

10

Listed In: Singers

Birthdate: April 10, 1991

Sun Sign: Aries

AJ Michalka is an American actress, musician, and singer-songwriter. She is credited with forming the popular pop duo Aly & AJ along with her sister Alyson Renae Michalka. Also a respected actress and voice actress, AJ Michalka has contributed to the success of several TV series, such as Steven Universe and The Goldbergs.

6

Ryan Paevey

(Actor and Model Known for His Role as ‘Nathan West’ in the ABC Soap Opera ‘General Hospital’)

74

23

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Birthdate: September 24, 1984

Sun Sign: Libra

Ryan Paevey is an American actor who achieved popularity after playing Nathan West on the popular daytime soap opera General Hospital. Also a model, Ryan Paevey has worked alongside famous personalities like Cher, Katy Perry, and Christina Aguilera. A self-proclaimed nature boy, Paevey loves traveling; he has launched a brand named Fortunate Wanderer, which sells photography from his travels.

Nancy Lopez

(American Professional Golfer)

14

5

Listed In: Sportspersons

Birthdate: January 6, 1957

Sun Sign: Capricorn

Nancy Lopez is an American former professional golfer. She won 48 LPGA Tour events, including three majors, in an illustrious professional career that spanned more than 25 years. She was also part of the U.S. national team, helping her team win the 1990 Solheim Cup. In 1987, Nancy Lopez was inducted into the World Golf Hall of Fame.

Listed In: Film & Theater Personalities

Daryl Sabara is best known as Juni Cortez from the Spy Kids film franchise. He has also appeared in projects such as The Polar Express and Keeping Up with the Steins, and has voiced Rex Salazar in Generator Rex. He also appeared as a judge on America's Most Talented Kids.

Rener Gracie

(Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu Practitioner)

1

2

Listed In: Sportspersons

Birthdate: November 10, 1983

Sun Sign: Scorpio

Part of the Brazilian Gracie family that has pioneered the its own form of martial arts, Rener Gracie has a black belt in Brazilian jiu-jitsu. He has also co-created the Gracie University martial arts curriculum and owns Quikflip Apparel. He is married to three-time WWE Divas Champion Eve Torres.

Antonio Margarito

(Mexican-American Former Professional Boxer)

0

3

Listed In: Sportspersons

Birthdate: March 18, 1978

Sun Sign: Pisces

Known to fans as The Tijuana Tornado, Mexican-American boxer Antonio Margarito once held multiple welterweight world titles. He was suspended by the California State Athletic Commission when he was found to have planned to injure Shane Mosley with a plaster-like substance kept inside his hand wraps.

Naná Vasconcelos

(Percussionist)

1

1

Listed In: Musicians

Birthdate: August 2, 1944

Sun Sign: Leo

Died: March 9, 2016

Naná Vasconcelos was a Brazilian percussionist and berimbau player. He was also a vocalist. He worked as a backing musician with Pat Metheny, Don Cherry, Björk, and Jan Garbarek, among others. He also had a successful solo career and released over two dozen albums. He was the recipient of several awards, including eight Grammy Awards.

Friedrich von Thun und Hohenstein

(Austrian Diplomat and Administrator Known For His Rivalry With Prussian Counterpart, Otto Von Bismarck)

0

0

Listed In: Miscellaneous

Birthdate: May 8, 1810

Sun Sign: Taurus

Died: September 24, 1881

Friedrich von Thun und Hohenstein was an Austrian diplomat and administrator. He is best remembered for his service as the president of the German federal diet in 1850. An astute politician, Friedrich von Thun also served as minister to Prussia as well as Russia.
